Package Camp

Class Camp

java.lang.Object
Camp.Camp
public class Camp extends Object
Represents a camp with various attributes such as name, dates, location, and attendees.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

  • Constructor Details

    • Camp

      public Camp(String name, Date startDate, Date endDate, Date registrationDeadline, String[] committeeList, boolean onlyFaculty, String location, String description, String staffInCharge, String[] attendees, boolean visible, int totalSlots, int committeeSlots, String[] withdrawals)
      Constructs a new Camp object with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the camp.
      startDate - The start date of the camp.
      endDate - The end date of the camp.
      registrationDeadline - The registration deadline for the camp.
      committeeList - An array of committee names associated with the camp.
      onlyFaculty - A boolean indicating whether the camp is available only to faculty.
      location - The location of the camp.
      description - The description of the camp.
      staffInCharge - The staff member in charge of the camp (stored as a string of their user ID).
      attendees - An array of user IDs representing attendees of the camp.
      visible - A boolean indicating whether the camp is visible.
      totalSlots - The total number of slots available for the camp.
      committeeSlots - The number of slots reserved for committees (maximum 10).
      withdrawals - An array of user IDs representing withdrawls from the camp.

    • getOnlyFaculty

      public boolean getOnlyFaculty()
      Retrieves the faculty restriction status for the staff member in charge of the camp.
      Returns:
      true if the staff member is restricted to their own faculty, false otherwise.
